The location for cards attached as Xyz Material. Also the location used for "stacked" cards  (for anime-only cards)
All locations on the field. The sum of LOCATION_MZONE+LOCATION_SZONE
Changes the position of the skill face-down/face-up, updating the code as well. The code is value&0xffffffff. 0x100000000 is face-up and 0x200000000 is face-down.
All possible locations. This is the sum of LOCATION_ONFIELD, LOCATION_DECK, LOCATION_HAND, LOCATION_GRAVE, LOCATION_REMOVED, LOCATION_EXTRA and LOCATION_OVERLAY

Location for cards that are place in Deck and then the Deck is shuffled. Used only in Location Redirect

Complex reset. The sum of RESET_TURN_SET, TOGRAVE, REMOVE, TEMP_REMOVE, TOHAND, TODECK, LEAVE and TOFIELD, to be used with RESET_EVENT

Complex reset. The sum of RESETS_STANDARD+RESET_DISABLE, used with RESET_EVENT. Used for effects that need to reset when the monster's effects are negated (eg a monster changing its ATK/DEF or Level with its own effect).
Complex reset. The sum of RESETS_STANDARD+RESET_OVERLAY-RESET_TOFIELD-RESET_LEAVE, most often used for EFFECT_LEAVE_FIELD_REDIRECT resets
Complex reset. The sum of RESETS_STANDARD-RESET_LEAVE, used in thing like ancient gear drill and troymare maybe.
Complex reset. The sum of  RESETS_STANDARD-RESET_TOGRAVE-RESET_LEAVE, mainly used for card that negate effect of card they destroy by battle.

Describes that an effect tributes
Describes that an effect banishes
Describes that an effect adds a card to the hand (from any location)
Describes that an effect adds a card to the Deck (from any location)
Describes that an effect sends a card to the Graveyard (from any location)
Describes that an effect removes a card(s) from the Deck (to move them to the Graveyard or to banish them)
Describes that an effect removes a card(s) from the hand (to move them to the Graveyard or to banish them)
Describes that an effect Normal Summons a monster(s)
Describes that an effect Special Summons a monster(s)
Describes that an effect Special Summons a token(s)
Describes a FLIP effect
Describes an effect that changes a card's battle position
Describes that an effect takes or switches control
Describes an effect that negates a card effect (not an effect's activation)
Describes an effect that negates the summon of a monster
Describes that a card draws
Describes that a card searches
Describes that a card equips
Describes that a card deals damage
Describes that a card recovers life points
Describes that a card changes ATK
Describes that a card changes DEF
Describes an effect that places Counters
Describes that a card uses a coin
Describes that a card uses a dice
Describes an effect that causes a card to leave the Graveyard
Describes an effect that changes a card's level
Describes an effect that negates the activation of an effect
Describes an effect that requires declaring a card name
Describes an effect that Fusion Summons
Describes an effect that sends/return a card to the Extra Deck
The message that appears when the given player next selects a card
The message that appears on screen to tell a player which option their opponent selected
Called when selecting/declaring a monster type
Called when selecting/declaring an attribute
Used with "Booster Draft Duel"
Called when a player has to pick/declare a number
Sets the code of a skill card. If it is called first, the skill is created face-up.
Sets the cover and id for a skill card. Cover is  value & 0xffffffff, code is (value>>32) & 0xffffffff. If  it iscalled first, the skill is created face-down.
Changes the position of the skill face-down/face-up, updating the code as well. The code is value&0xffffffff. 0x100000000 is face-up and 0x200000000 is face-down.

This flags is required to use EFFECT_REVERSE_DECK
This flags is used with Removing Brainshwashing
N/A
This flag is required when using EVENT_DETACH_MATERIAL
A flag related with a limit a player can attempt Special Summons. Used with El Shaddoll Winda
Allows EFFECT_TYPE_XMATERIAL to take SetCountLimit into account
Allows checking the Graveyard in the middle of a resolving chain. Flag required to use EFFECT_SELF_TOGRAVE
Cards that can only be special Summoned once per turn. This flga is related to Card.SetSPSummonOnce ()
A flag to be used with SetCountLimit. An effect that receives this can only be ACTIVATED a given number of times (activations that are negated do not count)
A flag to be used with SetCountLimit. The effect that receives this flag can only be used a given amount of times per duel.

A flag to be used with SetCountLimit. Usually used with multiple effects of the same card, the value set is the maximum count among all those effects. Example: "Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects."
A flag for duel modes. You can control the AI/Opponent
A flag for duel modes. You can attack on the first turn
A flag for duel modes. Deprecated flag in Edopro's 8.0 core
A flag for duel modes. Applies First turn draw and ignition priority
A flag for duel modes. The deck is not shuffled
A flag for duel modes. Doubles PP. Use this constant name in the scripts (internally called DUEL_TAG)
A flag for duel modes. The AI/Opponent will activate effects whenever prompted
Use this constant name in the scripts (internally called DUEL_1_FACEUP_FIELD)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_3_COLUMNS_FIELD+DUEL_NO_MAIN_PHASE_2+DUEL_TRIGGER_ONLY_IN_LOCATION)

A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_3_COLUMNS_FIELD+DUEL_NO_MAIN_PHASE_2+DUEL_NO_STANDBY_PHASE+DUEL_1ST_TURN_DRAW+DUEL_INVERTED_QUICK_PRIORITY+DUEL_DRAW_UNTIL_5+DUEL_NO_HAND_LIMIT+DUEL_UNLIMITED_SUMMONS+DUEL_TRIGGER_ONLY_IN_LOCATION)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_OBSOLETE_IGNITION+DUEL_1ST_TURN_DRAW+DUEL_1_FIELD+DUEL_SPSUMMON_ONCE_OLD_NEGATE+DUEL_RETURN_TO_EXTRA_DECK_TRIGGERS+DUEL_CANNOT_SUMMON_OATH_OLD)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_1ST_TURN_DRAW+DUEL_1_FIELD+DUEL_SPSUMMON_ONCE_OLD_NEGATE+DUEL_RETURN_TO_EXTRA_DECK_TRIGGERS+DUEL_CANNOT_SUMMON_OATH_OLD)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_PZONE+DUEL_SEPARATE_PZONE+DUEL_SPSUMMON_ONCE_OLD_NEGATE+DUEL_RETURN_TO_EXTRA_DECK_TRIGGERS+DUEL_CANNOT_SUMMON_OATH_OLD)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_PZONE+DUEL_EMZONE+DUEL_SPSUMMON_ONCE_OLD_NEGATE+DUEL_RETURN_TO_EXTRA_DECK_TRIGGERS+DUEL_CANNOT_SUMMON_OATH_OLD)
A composite flag for duel modes. (DUEL_PZONE+DUEL_EMZONE+DUEL_FSX_MMZONE+DUEL_TRAP_MONSTERS_NOT_USE_ZONE+DUEL_TRIGGER_ONLY_IN_LOCATION)
